As one of the important applications of the medical application ecosystem under Military Hospital 7A. Contributing to the digitization of processes in the hospital, the application provides an intuitive and convenient solution for doctors and medical staff in managing, creating, and editing reports, documents, or patients. With convenience and high security, the application will reduce the user's time and effort, contributing to increasing work efficiency in a pressurized environment such as a hospital.
